decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to establish board control and disrupt your opponent's game plan by using cards like Ephemerate, Fatal Push, and Thoughtseize. By playing aggressive creatures like Boggart Trawler and Overlord of the Balemurk, you can pressure your opponent while also using cards like Flickerwisp and Solitude to protect your own creatures. Additionally, cards like Relic of Progenitus and Witch Enchanter can help you control the graveyard and draw additional cards. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm your opponent with efficient threats and disruptive spells.

The deck focuses on using efficient creatures and disruption spells to apply pressure on the opponent while also disrupting their game plan. It utilizes a mix of aggressive creatures like Boggart Trawler and Emperor of Bones, along with disruptive spells like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize. The deck also includes flicker effects like Ephemerate and Flickerwisp to gain additional value from enters-the-battlefield abilities. The goal is to quickly establish a board presence and disrupt the opponent's strategy in order to secure a victory.

The deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells, utilizing Leylines to pump up the team and Tribal Flames as a finisher. It also includes disruptive spells like Stubborn Denial to protect its threats. The mana base is designed to support a wide range of colors for maximum flexibility in casting spells. The deck aims to maintain pressure throughout the game and close out games quickly before the opponent can stabilize.

This deck focuses on using faithless looting and persist to get creatures into the graveyard, then reanimating them with cards like archon of cruelty and emperor of bones. Consign to memory can also be used to bounce creatures back to your hand for more reanimation. The deck also includes counter spells like spell snare and removal spells like lightning bolt and fatal push to control the board. Tamiyo, inquisitive student helps with card draw and selection, while psychic frog provides additional graveyard manipulation. The mana base includes a variety of fetch lands to ensure consistent mana fixing.

This deck focuses on leveraging the Hardened Scales enchantment to maximize the effectiveness of +1/+1 counters on creatures, specifically boosting the power and toughness of creatures like Hangarback Walker and Walking Ballista. It also includes artifacts like Arcbound Ravager and Inkmoth Nexus to quickly build a threatening board presence. The deck utilizes cards like Agatha's Soul Cauldron and The Ozolith to further enhance the counters and maintain board control. With a mix of artifact synergy and creature aggression, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of damage and resilience.

The main concept of this deck is to assemble the necessary components to generate a massive amount of mana through spells like Pyretic Ritual and Desperate Ritual, while also utilizing cards like Ruby Medallion and Ral, Monsoon Mage to reduce the cost of spells. By casting Past in Flames and utilizing Glimpse the Impossible, the deck aims to create a loop that allows for continuous casting of spells and ultimately winning the game through a powerful combo. The deck also includes cards like Wish and Valakut Awakening for additional utility and card advantage.
